overview: The two guys in the first scene are absolutely delicious examples of the humpy horny boy-next-door cuteness we all adore and admire. They suck each other for around thirty minutes, the cute “younger Matt Damon look-a-like” delivering two juicy loads. Scene two is a really quick JO by a cute rocker-dude that would fit nicely in any Brad Posey video. Then... quickly we are treated to the mega-cute lad from scene one again. You won't believe what happens in this scene, but let's just say he is far more flexible than he looks.
title: Sperm Cocktail
